divs: Sighting Detailsmlk blvd heading north east. objects were north. Just randomly looked up at the sky , and the reflection caught my eye of one of the objects. Then I notice another object follwing, keep the same distance behind the first object. I wsn't alone. with 3 others, we watcvh the objects unitl they took off and we lost track of them. I was pointing out the obkect to people on the street corners , bascally anybody that was in yelling range..
Summary: 2 metal looking objects hovering for a while then floowing a straight path before "shooting off"
